de.ityx.mediatrix.api.client

Interface ICContex

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IContexCommon

    public interface ICContex
extends IContexCommon
    provides functions to manage the communication with the contex e.g. to load masters, subcats.
    How to use:
    API.getClientAPI().getContexAPI().loadAllSubcats(project);

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface de.ityx.mediatrix.api.interfaces.IContexCommon

        CONTEX_CLASSIFICATION, CONTEX_DESIGNER, CONTEX_EXTRACTION, CONTEX_MCLASSIFICATION, CONTEX_NO

    • Method Detail

      • storeSubprojectMapping

        void storeSubprojectMapping(Subproject p)
        Stores the Subproject as Mapping with the equivalent table [ in this case,,teilprojekt,, ]
        in the database. This mean that a subproject Object represents a data row in
        the table and the columns are the Object's attribute
        Parameters:
        p - Subproject to store

        Parameters:

        Returns:
